name: The Axys Adventures: Truth Seeker - Battle Against the Lies
name_original: The Axys Adventures: Truth Seeker - Battle Against the Lies
description:
The Axys Adventures: Truth Seeker - Battle Against the Lies is an action game developed by Rebel Planet Creations. It was originally released in 2006. Rebel Planet Creations published the game.
The Axys Adventures: Truth Seeker - Battle Against the Lies is available on PC.
